verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hover o’er me, Holy Spirit, Bathe my trembling heart and brow; Fill me with Thy hallowed presence, Come, O come and fill me now.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Fill me now, fill me now, Jesus, come and fill me now; Fill me with Thy hallowed presence, Come, O come and fill me now.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thou canst fill me, gracious Spirit, Though I cannot tell Thee how; But I need Thee, greatly need Thee, Come, O come and fill me now.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I am weakness, full of weakness, At Thy sacred feet I bow; Blest, divine, eternal Spirit, Fill with pow’r and fill me now.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Cleanse and comfort, bless and save me, Bathe, O bathe my heart and brow; Thou are comforting and saving, Thou art sweetly filling now.
